name: Unpossible Rivals
description:
A Game with 5 Levels with 5 Bosses with Different Abilities. Unbelievable powers of trainers are used as pickups to be used by players. Controls:-

W/A/S/D - Movement

Left Click - Shoot

Powers - You will get though game

Powers:-

1. Infinite Bullets

2. Infinite Helmet Health

3. Infinite Move Speed

4. One Hit Kill (For Beginner Players) :)

0. Infinite Health (Hidden somewhere in some level)

(PC Build)

Also added a Director's Cut with Hardest difficulty mode with no Powers and more aggressive enemies.(Hope it lives up to the skill levels of the experienced players).

Tip:- Still some bugs are there, but worry not, that makes the game more interesting though. :)

Credits:-

THE ART KIT IS: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Music:- Made with Groove Pad application from playstore.
